resources.string: SASTRA University and Coca-Cola serve you the latest edition of KURUKSASTRA ‘15, a National level cultural fest – and this time it’s spicier and tastier! Come and indulge your senses in the most sumptuous buffet of events spanning 3 days and tease your taste buds by savoring the mouthwatering delicacies offered by each of our clusters. With a myriad of creative and euphoric events, showcase your expertise in this cultural extravaganza and prove your mettle by donning different chef hats and smoking the stage! Ignite the passion and vigor in your stomach and soup up as it is going to be LEGEN-wait for it- DARY, this spring! Good Luck and Bon Appetit!
Choose the clusters for which you wish to receive notifications

SASTRA University and Aircel serve you the latest edition of KURUKSASTRA ‘15, a National level cultural fest – and this time it’s spicier and tastier! Come and indulge your senses in the most sumptuous buffet of events spanning 3 days and tease your taste buds by savoring the mouthwatering delicacies offered by each of our clusters. With a myriad of creative and euphoric events, showcase your expertise in this cultural extravaganza and prove your mettle by donning different chef hats and smoking the stage! Ignite the passion and vigor in your stomach and soup up as it is going to be LEGEN-wait for it- DARY, this spring! Good Luck and Bon Appetit!

Short film is to Feature film what Maggi is to Hakka Noodles. The only difference is time and money. The art remains the same. The recipe for a short film is simple. Impress your audience. The butter is on the popcorn. The straw is in the soda cup. The audience is ready. Are you?\n\n

80% of decisions made for buying food products can be attributed to the products’ advertisements. Minute made tests the unique ability of being able to come up with a creative idea that is funny, thoughtful and/or catchy. But can you do it before someone makes a glass of tang?\n\n

Like cooking, photography is an art form that is dying. You go around thinking you can cook, but you know you are owned when you taste your mother’s cooking. Only an expert can make everyone shut up. So pick up that camera and prove to the world, who the mother of all shutterbugs is.
The Ultimate Movie Geek Battle is back. All those movie debates over lunch and dinner maybe the only arsenal you need. Suit up and prepare yourself. No Prisoners. No Mercy. Forth Eorlingas!\n\n

Quintessentially, Tempura consists of vegetables that have been battered and deep fried. Bringing out the freshest and most skilled talent to the intensely heated arena of drama, we present the flagship event of Dramatics at Kuruksastra ’15, Tempura. The roast is now passé, Tempura is here.\n\n

Writing requires bravery, scriptwriting more so. If you are a script writer, write the deepest and truest you can. Writing, in essence is quite like concasse. You choose your ingredients, peel and deseed, and then dice them up to create a delectable delight. We’re not looking for chefs, but if you think you can mince your words quite literally, then Concasse is the event for you.

Flambé: the exquisite and flamboyant art of tableside food presentation. Flambéing is an art form used by the French chefs since time immemorial to grab eyeballs. Moving out from the kitchen, and on to the stage, the art of screenplay comes closest to flambéing. Concoct the most visually appealing flambé on stage and get ready to get noticed.\n\n

A dollop of happiness. A hint of excitement. A pinch of anxiety. All of this garnished with truckloads of drama, sugar, spice and everything nice. Witness the creation of the most fun filled, lip smacking tossed salad ever, at Kuruksastra ’15.

Venue
Time:

The Gen Quiz at KS 15. The quiz will your test your knowledge about the world in general. Prepare to face off against the Masterminds and come through with flying colours. Get ready to get your brains flambéed.\n\n
If you’re sports fanatic or cannot get enough of entertainment then this is the place for you to be. Prepare to get served!\n\n
Sugar, spice and everything nice – the AV quiz at KS ’15 is set to spice you up with the essence of music and pop culture. AVid tasters are welcome.\n\n

Do you think you have the ability to convey something to your friends without uttering a single word? Enthral us with your miming skills and show off your chemistry with your team-mates. It’s okay if you can bite more than you can chew, you can always act it out.\n\n

An amalgamation of all events that happen at English Lits. Be prepared to face any challenge thrown at you including miming, speaking, quizzes and word events. A multitude of courses to whet your appetite, so get your creative juices flowing!\n\n

Are you that garrulous person in your gang who can go nuts with the given topic? Or if you like to point out errors in someone else\'s speech you don\’t need to go further than JAM, the signature event at English Lits. Spread over a minute, it promises to leave you hungry for more.\n\n

What would you do if you had to face the unknown? Gear up to ramble on without prior preparation. Extempore will challenge your imagination and will be a test of your ability to portray it effectively. It doesn\’t matter if your jokes are bitter or sweet; just don’t forget to be funny.\n\n

Do you like to argue relentlessly to get your point across? Do you like to leave opponents dumb founded with your eloquence? Then this is the perfect platform for you to showcase your talent with words. Let the feast begin!\n\n

Can you adroitly grasp the finer nuances of Ye Olde English? Glean hidden meanings from seemingly innocuous words? It is in fact a language difficult to master. A plethora of word games like etymologies, anagrams and rebuses. A host of questions that boggle your mind. We know it\'s on the tip of your tongue, but What\'s The Good Word?\n\n

Your ability to solve cryptic clues set in a two-dimensional grid will be tested in this event. We will put our best efforts into giving Ximenians a run for their money while retaining the integrity of the grid. So gather round for your three squares of the day!\n\n
Sur taal ka baethay sahi taam mel\nGaano ka romanchak khel!
Apki vanni ki fruttyness ki pariksha li jayegi\n\n
Kitna samajhte hai aap apne sathi ko, bina bole, bina muh khole, dil ki baat bujho to jane...\n\n
Theekhi mirchi: soch samajh ke kerna bang verna milega bura punishment!\n\n
Hota to sabke paas hai, par koi istemaal nhi karta...dimaag ke har kone ka poorn istemaal krne ko kar denge hum majboor.\n\n
Milenge kai ratna,kuch khatte,kuch meethe,kuch teekhe to kuch karare, jeevan ki is thali me jo bhar laega sare ratna wahi kehlaega hamara NAVRATNA! \n\n
Apne bat ko batane ki shamta dikhaiye apne likhne ki prathibha se!! Vishe de diya jayega apko diye gaye samay mai sabse rachnatmak tareeke se likhna hai.\n\n
Apke bolne aur samajhne ki shamta ko dekha jayegi. vishe bharat se sambhandit kuch bhi diya jaa sakta hai.\n\n

Come and be a part Kuruksastra\'s battle of bands where the best bands spice up with their tastes and melt the hearts of the audience. Prove that your symphony can outclass any other, that your melody is beyond reproach, and that you can dish out the beats to keep our feet tapping!\n\n

Woo the crowd with the magic of pure vocals at our very own Kuruksastra stage. This euphoria is only to be experienced and cannot be expressed in words! Come and add a tinge of melody to the stage that awaits your soulful performance\n\n.

For all those budding classical vocalists out there, or even those in bloom, unleash the power of your voice in the true discipline and grace of classical melody, seize the chance and sing your heart out, enchanting us with the divine bliss!\n\n

Music has no language! Do you think you can recreate the magic created by maestros like Late Pandit Ravi Shankar, Pandit Hari Prasad Chaurasia, Ustad Zakir Hussain and many others? If you think so, then let your instruments speak in Raagam Taalam at Kuruksastra\'15!\n\n

Do you think you have it in you to become an Indian music idol? Do you think you are the favorite flavor of the lot? We need say no more, our words surely cannot match your dulcet notes. So without further ado, come to Kuruksastra where the best vocalists compete against each other through different challenges for the crown of the best singer - The KURUKSASTRA IDOL!\n\n

A mela in a city rich with history, is incomplete without the classical dance form. The stage is set for you to portray the grace in your dance with the abhinaya and jathis. It\’s your time to stand out and show your talent in any classical style dance form. With the perfect blend of all the ingredients of classical dance, we bring you NRITYA.\n\n

Do you have a story to tell? Do you all express stories with bewitching eyea blended with the grace in your every step? Then we have the perfect stage for you! With perfect combination of music and dance, entrap the audience in your story. The stage is yours to show the power of the thandav. With sugar, spice and more variety in dance, We present to you…Sugar \'n\' Spice(Theme).\n\n

Here at Brain on Boots we give you a stage to both prove your identity, and lose yourself in the beat and the moment. Gear up to flaunt and compete against the best crews in India, because the festival starts here.\n\n
Just as salt and pepper complete one another on a dining table, this event requires a partnership of two to compliment each other and give out a mouthful appetizer.\n\n

Ever had the guts to try something alone? Have a taste of Bertie Botts Every Flavoured Beans. Either you\'ll get to like the taste or end up getting a familiar one. Whatever be the result, you would have found yourself immersed in a sugar rush.\n\n

You\'ve seen art on paper, canvas, cloth even wood, but have you seen one on paper cups? Connect with your creativity and impress us with your oeuvre d\'art ! Create a magnificent work of art on a cup, and prove that art is really your \'cup of tea\'\n\n

Thinking out of the box cannot get much better than this! Carucate the most flaunting design from vegetable into objects which leave audience spellbound. Enchant us with your skills and get chopping!\n\n

You think dirt is uninteresting, boring, dull? Change our tastes by giving a different flavour - try clay modeling! Work your hands on a lump of clay and cook up great work of art! Show how impressive you are and turn the mundane into a masterpiece!\n\n
There is something lurking in the dark! Manipulate simple objects and make the shadows dance with life. If you love perspectives and angles, then this event is a piece of cake for you!\n\n

Are your fingers like Midas\'s golden touch? Do they have the ablility to add spice to a blank canvas? Design a mellifluous work of art with an intricate blend of appealing colours and imagination that is finger-licking good!\n\n

Come one! Come all! Arts at Kuruksastra provides you with a stage that will test your creativity and judge the inner foodie in you! So don\’t hold back, go ahead and produce any art that is mouth-watering and appealing!\n\n
உயர்திணையை உயர்த்தும் உயர்திண்மைத் தமிழ் - வழங்கும் அமிழ்தினை அறிந்தோர் ஆடும் ஆட்டம் - தமிழாட்டம்.\n\n
வாழ்விக்கும் சொல்லுக்கு, ஊழ் வந்து சேருமோ? சொலல்வல்லாரை இகல்வெல்லல் நேருமோ? சொல்லை வில்லாக்கி சரமாரி பெய்து சமர் வாகைச் சூடு இது சொற்போர்.\n\n

சொற்பருத்தி விதை தூவி, சொந்தக்
 கருத்தை யெல்லாம் உற்பத்தி செய்து,
 உன்னதக் கவியாடை நெய்வோர்
 கரம்பட்டால் நெய்யாய் மணக்கும் கவி.

புதினத்தின் வதனத்தைப் போற்றுவோர் எல்லாம்
 சதிராடும் சமர்க்களத்தின் விலாசம் - புதினா விலாசம்.

பற்படம் (பலப்படம்) யாவையும்
தற்படம் போலெண்ணி நற்படம் 
தேடும் கேள்வி - விடை தேடும்
பற்படக் கேள்வி.

சிப்பியிடும் முத்தெல்லாம் முத்தல்ல இசை
செப்பிடும் முத்தே முத்து. 
இசைக்கடல் கடந்து இன்முத்தெடுப்போம்.

மொழியற்று நிற்கையிலே
விழியுற்று நோக்கி
கண்கண்டுரைக்கும் மொழி - இது
கற்கண்டாயினிக்கும் மொழி.
-மௌனமொழி.

மூவரணி முறையாய் அமைந்து
யாவர் கேள்விக்கும் விடை பகன்றால்
வெற்றி ஒலி கேட்டு
விளக்குமந்தக் கூட்டு 
- முக்கூட்டு.

கடமாய் வயிறு குலுங்கிச் சிரிக்க
விகடமாய்ப் பேசுவதே தூண்டுகோல்.
 உயர் புன்னகையை முகத்தில் 
பூண்டுகொள்.

ఒకరికి గుత్తి వంకాయ కూరంటే ఇష్టం, ఇంకొకరికి వంకాయ పులుసంటే ఇష్టం, మరొకరికి అదే వంకాయని పచ్చడిగా చేసి వేడి అన్నంలో దట్టించి తినటం ప్రాణం. ఇలా ఇంటికి తెచ్చిన కేజీ వంకాయలతో ఏం చేస్తే బాగుంటుంది అని చర్చించుకునే మనం, చెయ్యి దాటిపోతున్న నేటి సామాజిక పరిస్థితుల గురించి చర్చించుకోలేమా? ఘాటైన చర్చలకు చిరునామా ఈ కారాలు మిరియాలు\n\n

చేతిలో వంటల పుస్తకం పట్టుకుని ఒక్కో పదార్థం జత చేస్తూ రుచికరమైన వంటలు చేస్తే గర్వంగా ఉంటుంది. అలాగే చేతిలో చిలిపి ప్రశ్నల చిట్టా పట్టుకుని చెంగు చెంగున పరిగెడుతూ నిధి ఉన్న చోటును కనిపెడితే ఇంకా ఆనందంగా ఉంటుంది. హుషారుగా షికారు చేయటానికి స్వాగతం చెబుతుంది ఈ అద్భుతహా..!\n\n

రెండు నిమిషాల్లో చేసే మ్యాగి ఆకలి తీరిస్తే, రెండు గంటల్లో చూసే సినిమా అలసట తీరుస్తుంది. నటీనటులు నవరసాలు కలబోసి నటిస్తే ఆహా అంటాం, వారి మాటలు, చేష్టలు అనుకరిస్తాం, “అదే అక్కడ నేనుంటేనా...” అని వాళ్ళ స్థానంలో మనల్ని ఊహించుకుంటాం. ఆ ఊహలు నిజం చేసే వేదిక, మీ నటనా చాతుర్యం ప్రదర్శించటానికి ఆసరా, ఈ నవరసాలు.\n\n

మదిలో ఊహలు మెదులుతుంటే, కాగితంపై కలం కదులుతుంటే, ఘుమఘుమలాడే కవితల పరవాన్నం తయారవుతుంది. అటుపై ప్రాసల జీడిపప్పుతో అలంకరించిన మీ ఊసుల కవిత, అవుతుందొక చరిత!! చదివే నోటికి ఆనందం, వినే చెవులకు అమృతం, అందించటమే ఈ రచనామృతం\n\n

రోజుకో ఆపిల్ తింటే రోగం దూరమవుతుంది , గంటకో గీతం వింటే మనసు తేలికవుతుంది..!!
మాటలకందని భావాల్ని కూడా మధురంగా చెబుతాయి మన తేనెలొలుకు పాటలు.
రాగం, తాళం, స్వరం, సాహిత్యం, సంగీతం... ఈ పంచామృతాలను కలిపిన పాటల పందిరే మా స్వర మాధురి.

“హాట్ సీట్ ”, “డైల్ ఏ దోస్త్”, “ఆడియన్స్ పోల్”... ఇవి ఈమధ్య కాలం లో అందరిని అలరిస్తున మాటలు. మనిషి మనుగడకు ఆహారం ఎంత అవసరమో, చుట్టూ జరిగే విషయాలపై అవగాహన కూడా అంతే అవసరం. వినోదం తో పాటుగా విజ్ఞానాన్ని జోడించి వడ్డించటమే లక్ష్యంగా మీ ముందుకు వస్తోంది ఈ మెడదుకు మేత. చూస్తూనే ఉండండి చిటికలో వచ్చేస్తాం!!!\n\n

ఆ దేవుడు మనకిచ్చిన గొప్ప వరం నవ్వు. అందుకే, ఉపవాసం అంటూ తినకుండా కూడా రోజు గడపచ్చు అని చెప్పిన పెద్దలు, ఉపహాస్యం అంటూ నవ్వకుండా ఒక రోజును గడపమని ఎక్కడా చెప్పలేదు..!! నాటి రేలంగి నుండి నేటి సప్తగిరి వరకు, నాటి జంధ్యాల నుండి నేటి త్రివిక్రమ్ వరకు అందరు చెప్పేది ఒక్కటే, నవ్వు..నవ్వించు..!! సరదా సరదాగా నవ్వులు పంచె కార్యక్రమం ఈ లడ్డు కావాలా నాయన..!\n\n

దోరగా వేగిన కూరగాయల్లో పడుచు పిల్ల ఓరగా చూసే చూపులా కారం, రుచి చుసిన ఘనుడు కోరగా వేసిన పులుపు, అన్నింటిని మించి నేరుగా వేసిన ఉప్పు, సమపాలంలో కుదిరితేనే ఓ మంచి వంటకం!!
అలాగే, మనసుపడి రాసుకున్న కథ, ఇష్టపడి రాసుకున్న కథనం, తపనపడి రాసుకున్న సంభాషణలు, అన్నింటిని మించి విరగబడి చేసే అభినయం, ముచ్చటగా కుదిరితేనే ఓ మంచి నాటకం!!
మీ అభిరుచిని వేదికపై ఆవిష్కరించేందుకే ఈ షడ్రుచి.

KS Upahaar is a SASTRA student organization which strives to improve the quality of education in the nearby schools. Upahaar was initiated in the year 2011 by a group of enthusiastic students with a view to ensure accessibility of education for children. Funds are collected through drop boxes placed at various locations throughout the institution and formal events are conducted during Kuruksastra, sponsored by Canopy, a student-run organization. The money collected during the period 2011-14 was used to provide several basic amenities to schools in Tirumalaisamudram, Chellapanpetti, Vallam Pudur and Nattani.
